section.title: &kw-hos-tm;: HPE Enhancements to OpenStack
section.para: &kw-hos-phrase; offers a number of value-added features and services that complement and enhance OpenStack and can be used to set up private cloud environments that scale from a few nodes up to 200 compute nodes.

note.para: &kw-hos-phrase; is the last supported release for HPE Linux, it is scheduled for deprecation in the next release. It is recommended that you migrate your compute nodes to another platform, such as SUSE Enterprise Linux Server.
